data.short_description: When writing down a message in a textbox, then switching to a channel you don't have permission to and then coming back to said textbox, your message will disappear from it.
data.steps_to_repro: - 1. Write down a message in a textbox (DO NOT SEND IT!) - 2. Go to a channel you don't have perms to chat in. - 3. Switch back to the channel you typed the message in.
